entry.title: AA31A. "Your Special Day" Fleur de Lis Calendar Ring - Adjustable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Daniella Darren Park
Type: Jewelry
Price: 54.99

This is a one of a kind ring to commemorate your amazing day.  

**In the notes section of cart page, please tell us the DAY of the month you want to celebrate, so we can add the stone to the calendar for you. 

What's your 'Special Day'? Your birthday? Anniversary? Engagement? Wedding? Recovery Day? Graduation? Birth of your child? The list is endless!

The Not Just Any Old Day...It's Your Special Day® Calendar Crown Charm Bracelet features the month of your choice with a Swarovski crystal that marks your special day. Our Calendar Bracelet incorporates our popular signature calendar "Datesake™" charm into a hip, stylish accessory that is not only beautiful but is a lovely, sentimental addition to your bracelet collection. Choose between Antique Silver or Antique Brass. Our plated pewter charm measuring 3/4" x 1" has a hand antiqued finish. Presented in a satin bag.

 

* This is a special order product that ships separately.  

**In the notes section of cart page, please tell us the DAY of the month you want to celebrate, so we can add the stone to the calendar for you.

entry.title: Z01.sR30. Serenity Spinner Ring.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Creative Gems
Type: Jewelry
Price: 15.95

Highly polished stainless steel spinner ring with Serenity Prayer and Cross.  

The spinner ring is believed to come from ancient Tibetan meditation traditions, and is called a "worry ring" because spinning the right is believed to have a calming effect on the mind and body.

God grant me the serenity to accept the things I can not change, the courage to change the things I can, and the Wisdom to know the difference.  

Pick your ring size.
